name: Volt
description: Volt is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With a shiny yellow box and classic buttons, Volt stands tall with soldier-like arms and legs. Its screen displays a mesmerizing snake pattern, adding a touch of intrigue to its appearance. To complete its look, Volt wears a pair of stylish glasses, elevating its cool factor. With a unique combination of retro and modern aesthetics, Volt is ready to conquer the digital world.
